name: CyanBreakout
description:
My very first released game.

Just wanted to make something simple and release it, might be buggy and quite light on features. I might revisit and add more mechanics and polish at a later date.

Current Features:

  • You can release the ball using left mouse button or space.
  • Move paddle using 'WASD' or hold right mouse button and move mouse left/right.
  • Ball speeds up when it hits your paddle, there might be a secret mechanic when it reaches full speed ;)

Known bugs:

  • Exit "crashes" the game in this web version.
